Description: Green steatite shabti of Hay with a striated lappet-wig, a carved face, an incised collar, crossed hands depicted holding two hoes in low relief, the legs inscribed with Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in one column of incised Hieroglyphs running down the front of the legs and four rows running around the back, the back of one arm is decorated with an incised representation of a seed-basket.
